name: MFSampledSP
tagline: Media Foundation based service provider for javax.sound.sampled.
body:
# Welcome!

_MFSampledSP_ is a free implementation of the [javax.sound.sampled](http://docs.oracle.com/javase/7/docs/api/javax/sound/sampled/spi/package-summary.html) service provider interfaces based on Microsoft's Media Foundation library.

Its main purpose is to decode audio files or streams to linear PCM.

## Homepage

For more information, please visit [http://www.tagtraum.com/mfsampledsp/](http://www.tagtraum.com/mfsampledsp/).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
